multi_metal_ml package¶

Submodules¶

multi_metal_ml.data_loader module¶

multi_metal_ml.data_loader.load_data(folder_path, user_defined_mapping=None)¶

Loads multiple CSVs from a folder and processes them for multi-material ML.

multi_metal_ml.model module¶

multi_metal_ml.model.build_model(time_steps)¶

Builds an LSTM model for sequence prediction.

multi_metal_ml.model.load_or_train_model(X, y, time_steps)¶

Loads an existing model or trains a new one if not found.

multi_metal_ml.model.train_model(X, y, time_steps)¶

Trains a new LSTM model and saves it.

multi_metal_ml.prediction module¶

multi_metal_ml.prediction.predict_microstructure(X, model, scaler)¶

Predicts microstructure based on input temperatures.

multi_metal_ml.preprocessing module¶

multi_metal_ml.preprocessing.generate_microstructure_labels(X, time_values, material_ids, user_defined_mapping=None)¶

Generates microstructure labels based on temperature, time thresholds, and material type.

Parameters: - X: Temperature data array (NumPy array of shape (n_samples, n_features)) - time_values: Corresponding time values (NumPy array of shape (n_samples,)) - material_ids: Array indicating which material each row belongs to (NumPy array of shape (n_samples,)) - user_defined_mapping: Optional dictionary for custom microstructure mappings

Returns: - labels: Array of predicted microstructure phases (same shape as X)

multi_metal_ml.preprocessing.preprocess_data(X)¶

Scales and reshapes input data for the ML model.

multi_metal_ml.utils module¶

multi_metal_ml.utils.get_label_mapping()¶

Return the label mapping dictionary.
